venue.name: Loon Mountain Ski Resort Parking Lot

item.description:
I'm planning to hike/bushwhack(BW) to Scar Ridge.   This is located near Mt Osceola and south side from Kanc.  Scar Ridge has 2 peaks - West Peak (3774 ft) which is listed as NEHH(New England 100 Highest). Another one is East Peak (3620 ft).  Both E/W peaks are listed as NHHH (New Hampshire 100 Highest).  As West Peak has 2 bumps ahd both has white canister in each, we're planning to peakbag those 2 bumps on this event.

This is "West Peak of West" white canister.  You can sign here on the small notebook in it. 

 

Please note that Vose Spur and Scar Ridge are the 2 of the toughest bushwhacking in NH state, in NEHH list, I believe.  So please read the complete event description before signing up!

 

 

 

 

Hiking/Bushwhacking Description:

 

* We meet at Loon Mountain Ski Resort Parking Lot on Kancamagus Highway, Lincoln, NH at 8:00AM.  I'm thinking to camp one day before, but, haven't completely decided yet.

* We will start hiking no later than 8:15AM.

* This is less than 9 miles RT Hike/BW.  NOTE: Since we'll be bushwhacking about 2/3 of total distance, there is no way to accurately describe total mileage of this hiking/BWing event.

* Again, this is not just hiking but including bushwhacking for considerable amount of distance in very thick spruce area.  If you don't want to be scratched by trees, please wear long sleeve, long pants.  Some people even prefer to wear protection eye glass. (I don't.)  Please bring smaller backpack as possible as you can to avoid stucking between tree branches.

 

Rules to follow:

* Please don't bring your friends who are NOT the member of this meetup group as I need to make sure no liability as well as hikers capability who are going to join my hike in advance.

* When you sign up this event, you'll be asked several questions such that I can get to know your hiking experience if I haven't hiked with you yet.  If you've already hiked with me in past and you believe I know you, you may not have to answer...   Otherwise, to answer to my questions are NOT an optional.

* I do not prefer "No Show" after you signing up.  Please make sure to update your RSVP when your plan has changed.  

 

Weather Check Point:

Weather check point will be done on Sep 9th (Fri), 7PM.   I'll hike at Adirondacks High Peaks on Sep 10th, therefore, there is no email/phone access one day before this event. If you need to contact me, please do so by Friday, Sep 9th, 5PM.

 

 Note:  At the higher elevation, temp might be colder than you assume.  Please don't underestimate the cold weather in higher elevation and make sure to bring appropriate gear such as waterproof jacket (in case of rain) etc.   Please bring enough water, snack and lunch.  Needless to say, please bring your headlamp, although I'd like to come back to the parking lot before getting dark.  There is no access to brook etc. to retrieve water during this hike/BW. 

If you have any questions, please feel free to drop me an email.

 

Assistant Organizer, (and Hike/Snowshoe in Vermont! Meetup Group Organizer)

Tomoko Nakajima

 

As a condition of your voluntary participation in this activity you acknowledge and agree to the following: this activity involves inherent risks that can cause property damage, injury, illness, disability, and/or death to participants and/or others; you assume all risk associated with this activity; you are responsible for having the necessary knowledge, skills, abilities, clothing, and equipment to safely participate in this activity; you know and will follow the Hiker Responsibility Code described at www.hikesafe.com; the leader(s) of this activity are volunteers; and you release, hold harmless, and indemnify the leader(s) and all members of this group from any and all claims for property damage, injury, illness, disability, and/or death - including those caused by negligence and/or other reasons.
item.how_to_find_us: My Car is Honda CR-V(Blue, VT plate)
item.name: Scar Ridge Bushwhacking (97/100 in NEHH)
